Formula.name: Formula
Formula.hint: The formula that will be added to the chat.

Row.name: Row
Row.hint: The row the button will be placed on.

Label.name: Label
Label.hint: (Optional) The label shown in case the dice has no image.

Tooltip.name: Tooltip
Tooltip.hint: (Optional) The tooltip shown when hovering over the button. Defaults to the Formula.

Color.name: Color
Color.hint: (Optional) The color that fills the image. Defaults to white.

DiceRows.Instruction1: Click any dice button to edit it.
DiceRows.Instruction2: Right-Click any dice button to delete it.

enableDiceTray.name: Enable Dice Tray
enableDiceTray.hint: Enable showing a dice tray below the chat message area (requires reload).

enableDiceCalculator.name: Enable Dice Calculator
enableDiceCalculator.hint: Enable showing a dice calculator dialog when clicking the d20 icon near the chat box (requires reload).
